According to me, Dynamic validation feature is not behaving properly means
When you set it to true & supply a xsd file, even though it doesn't validate the
instance document. (Tested in 1.4.2 & 1.4.3 )
creator: gopal.sharma@sun.com

text:
Dynamic validation feature works fine when a DTD file is provided. The problem
comes when a schema file is provided. When the dynamic validation feature is set
to true, the validation feature is automatically set to true and the instance
document is validated if a DTD file is provided. When a schema file is provided,
the instance document is validated only if the dynamic validation feature is
false and the validation feature is true.
creator: pavani.mukthipudi@sun.com
